description:
Turn the elevator back on but don't make a noise - it could be hiding in the dark...

The Hush project:

Hush is a short horror game made by 8 French students during 4 weeks.  Your goal is to find four levers scattered in an ever-changing basement. The place is shrouded in darkness, therefore you will have to use the flash of your camera to find your way around. Once all the levers are activated, you just have to get to the elevator to escape.

Gameplay:

  • Short horror game
  • "Flash to see" mechanic
  • Ever-changing level
  • Sound-base stealth

Activate the levers:

Find your way to the four levers scattered around in the basement in order to activate the elevator. Once activated, try to get back and escape.

Escape from the monster:

During your exploration, you will be haunted by a monster wandering in the basement. As soon as you'll active the first lever, it'll start to hunt you until you get caught.
